nodes.text: The scientist Dr Cylo maintained his own army of marines aboard his whale fleet. Several marines were killed when Darth Vader, Dr Aphra, and her squad breached Cylo's flagship. These soldiers saw action against Imperial forces during Cylo's attempted hijacking of the Super Star Destroyer Executor as part of a plot to overthrow Emperor Palpatine. Cylo's remaining marines were killed by Lord Vader aboard Cylo's second flagship, which crashed into a star, killing Cylo.
